description:
When stepping, or gliding, out on a cold day, you need base layers that will keep you warm and dry. Made from lightweight quick-drying material, the Fierce long sleeve sets you up for success and comfort.

  • Light and stretch poly blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • High collar is a great next to skin layer when paired with a neck warmer or tube
  • Drop tail hemline provides more coverage
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Slim athletic fit layers well
name: Kari Traa Fierce Long Sleeve - Women's
